titles.title: Financial Institution Regulator Whistleblower Protection Act of 1993
To provide financial institution regulators with whistleblower protection.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Deposit Insurance.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
committee.subcommittee: Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Deposit Insurance

bill.summary: 3/16/1993--Introduced. Financial Institution Regulator Whistleblower Protection Act of 1993 - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to prohibit any insured depository institution or Federal banking regulatory agency from taking any reprisal action against an employee who has reported possible violations of Federal banking laws.
